name: TheWirelessBuzz
tag_list: wireless, mobile, b2b, trade-site, dealers, wireless-dealers, wireless-industry, nokia, motorola, boost, verizon, t-mobile, att, cingular, samsung, nextel, sprint, pcs, cdma, gsm, iden
overview: TheWirelessBuzz is a B2B Trade site for the wireless industry. Post all your inventory for free so people around the world can see what stock you carry and also new vendors can offer new stock. The New buzz in the wireless dealer market. Thewirelessbuzz.com has an easy and secure way to help your business grow. From buying to selling, clients from all over the world will be able to see what you want to buy or sell. Fast, easy and convenient you will be able to post all your buying and selling needs in no time.
